title: Riot can you stop making dumb changes NO ONE ASKED FOR....
body:
Seriously stop making changes for the sake of change. No one wanted half the changes and most people were content with how the game was. Small tweaks to number values not complete item and champ reworks...... its no wonder so many people are jumping off this game this season.

 {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

replies.body: Dont mistake reddit/boards echo chamber for reality.
to be honest if the game was the same except for number values would honestly make the game boring, kinda stale and easier to leave XDD
